      • validateCreateData

        public boolean validateCreateData(java.lang.String cmt,
                                  int rate,
                                  FoodOpeningPackage food)
        Validate the Survey which is created. Check all the input of user
        Parameters:
        cmt - : Comment of survey
        rate - : Rate of survey (From 1 to 5)
        food - : FoodOpeningPackage object which is rated
        Returns:
        true if the information are all correct
